name: Cazarin Interactive
tagline: Digital Marketing Agency / Full-Service Web Design
description:
Cazarin Interactive is a website design, development, and digital marketing company based in Minneapolis/St. Paul, Minnesota. Since April 1998, we have been providing a creative array of technology-based marketing solutions.
Our agile approach to project management allows the scope of our work to adapt to your evolving needs as projects progress. That’s the difference of Marketing Fusion. Marketing Fusion is a direct reflection of our values as an organization. It allows for a free atmosphere of collaboration where we collectively define our intentions as needs arise.
Every relationship we build advances at its own pace and takes on a unique shape all its own. We are a Google Partner specializing in paid search and online display advertising.
